name: mathoftjs
description: Evaluation of math terms over specified ranges.

scripts.prebtest: clear && rm -rf test && npx babel src --out-dir test --ignore "src/browserentry.js"
scripts.btest: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc --require @babel/register --require esm --reporter=text mocha ./test/mocha/nodetestrunner.js
scripts.pretest: clear && rm -rf test && rsync -rv src/* test
scripts.test: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc --require esm --reporter=text mocha ./test/mocha/nodetestrunner.js
scripts.build: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=production babel src --out-dir lib --ignore "src/mocha/,src/browserentry.js"
scripts.predisttest: clear && rm -rf disttest && mkdir disttest && cp src/mocha/custommochainfo.css src/mocha/mathoftmochajs.html disttest && browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ @babel/preset-env ] --plugins [ @babel/plugin-proposal-class-properties ] ] src/mocha/browsertestrunner.js -o disttest/mathoftmochajs-browser.js
